text: Miguel Ángel Arellano Pulido (born 11 May 1952) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo alumni Category:Mexican lawyers Category:Mexican prosecutors
title: Miguel Ángel Arellano Pulido
